title: Preparation Narrative
text: This is the narrative report for the preparation for our immersion, starting from our first meet up until before the D-day

title: Immersion Day Narrative
text: This is the narrative report for all of the things that happened during our immersion from the start to end, allow us to share our experience

title: Conclusion Narrative
text: This is the conlcusion for our overall experience before, during, and after the immersion. We are grateful for this experience
